name: A Store Room
description:
You are in a small store room.  Assorted junk is piled on shelves or
leaning against walls.
   The only apparent exit it back south.

exits.keywords: door wooden~ 1 -1 2530 S #2533 A Broom Closet~    You are in a dark broom closet.  Many straw brooms and other cleaning instruments have been left here, apparently unused (perhaps the maid quit?).    The only exit leads back north to the hallway.
door wooden~ 1 -1 2530 S #2534 A Hallway~    You are in a long hallway leading north and south.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.

extra_descriptions.description: The walls shed a warm light
